name: IT Fundamentals
description: IT Fundamentals (ITF+) covers a range of IT topics and provides a solid grounding in the technology concepts and practices organizations use today.

name: A+
description: A+ is the starting point for a career in IT. The performance-based exams certify foundational IT skills across a variety of devices and operating systems.

name: Network+
description: Network+ certifies the essential skills needed to confidently design, configure, manage and troubleshoot any wired and wireless devices

name: Security+
description: Security+ provides a global benchmark for best practices in IT network and operational security, one of the fastest-growing fields in IT.

name: Cloud+
description: Cloud+ validates the skills and expertise required to securely implement, maintain and utilize cloud technologies.

name: Linux+
description: Linux+ is an internationally recognized credential validating technical competencies required for junior-level Linux administrators

name: Server+
description: Server+ demonstrates the technical knowledge and skills required to perform a variety of tasks on server platforms.

name: CySA+
description: Cybersecurity Analyst (CySA+) applies behavioral analytics to the IT security field to improve the overall state of IT security.

name: CASP+
description: CASP+ is an advanced certification that validates critical thinking and judgment across a spectrum of security disciplines in complex environments

name: PenTest+
description: CompTIA PenTest+ is for intermediate level cybersecurity professionals who are tasked with penetration testing to manage vulnerabilities on a network.

name: Data+
description: CompTIA Data+ is an early-career data analytics certification that gives you the confidence to bring data analysis to life and make data-driven business decisions.

name: Project+
description: Project+ validates the ability to initiate, manage and complete a project or business initiative on time and within budget.

name: CTT+
description: CTT+ validates the knowledge and use of tools and techniques necessary for successfully teaching in todays learning environments.

name: Cloud Essentials+
description: Cloud Essentials+ demonstrates that both IT and non-technical professionals have the essential business acumen required to make informed cloud service decisions and recommendations
